casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Appellee, v. Max ZISKIN, Appellant. No. 324. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 13, 1940. Raymond F. O’Brien, of New York City (Charles A. Oberwager, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. John T. Cahill, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Jesse Moss, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

, Judgment affirmed.
